name: Bad Hop Baseball
description:
Power up and swing for the fences in this casual yet chaotic take on an American classic.

  • Bad Hop Baseball is a game for one or two players
  • Two Player Hot-Seat PvP or One Player Against a CPU Opponent
  • Players take turns taking shots
  • Players control the power and timing of their swing. After that, it's up to chance!
  • Each shot generates a Baseball Outcome e.g. out / hit / double / triple / home run
  • As in baseball, when one side has been put out 3 times, that side is retired for the inning
  • When one player is retired, the other player will keep batting until they have been put out 3 times as well
  • The game is 3 innings long
  • Games cannot end in a tie! Extra innings will continue until a result is reached
  • In-Game, In-Session, and All-Time stats are saved! Because if there's one thing we baseball fans love, it's STATS.
